thread.title: Terrified Kendall Jenner recalls "freaking out and sobbing" when man trespassed at her California home
thread.title_full: Terrified Kendall Jenner recalls "freaking out and sobbing" when man trespassed at her California home

author: Lara Martin
title: Terrified Kendall Jenner recalls "freaking out and sobbing" when man trespassed at her California home
text:
Celebs Terrified Kendall Jenner recalls "freaking out and sobbing" when man trespassed at her California home The reality star and model was left in tears after being approached by the stranger outside her home Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Kendall reveals how she found a trespasser at her home Share this video Get celebs updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
A terrified Kendall Jenner has recalled how she fled in tears after a man approached her home in California and begged to talk with her. 
The Keeping Up With The Kardashians star was petrified after the unknown man allegedly turned up at the gate of her property while she was alone and then chased her down the street when she drove away. 
Kendall, 21, recalls the incident in an upcoming episode of KUWTK, saying: “I came home one night and there was a guy sitting on the side of my street. I thought, that’s so weird. He looked like a homeless man, just sitting in his knees in the street. Kendall said she was freaked out (Photo: E!) Scott listens (Photo: E!) 
“I was like, that’s weird… I drove around and went into my house and I watched the gate close. I turned my car off, getting my stuff together. 
"I'm about to open my door and I look in my rearview mirror and he was standing right there. 
“I just saw his figure, in the gate right behind my car." 
Kendall tells mum Kris Jenner and Scott Disick that she was scared, saying: “I’m freaking out and he goes, I need to talk to you. I was like, no! You need to leave!” Read More Kris was scared (Photo: E!) Scott looks horrified by Kendall's story (Photo: E!) Read More Kim Kardashian feared she'd be raped and shot in head as she relives Paris robbery in harrowing KUWTK episode 
“I called one of my friends immediately. I'm sobbing and crying. He's at my window, banging on my window, screaming at me. So, then I finally start backing out and I get to my gate. The gate opens and I get out. He all of sudden starts running after me. 
“At that moment it was when my friends pulled up, and they had him sit on the curb waiting for the police to come. I was crying and freaking out.” 
Kendall adds that the experience changed how she felt about being alone. “I used to be the one who was so independent. I was always kind of by myself in a good way, now it’s fully flipped.” Kendall in Paris recently (Photo: Splash News) Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
